hero.title: Experience
hero.subtitle: My professional journey in full-stack development and AI/ML engineering

cta.title: Interested in Working Together?
cta.subtitle: Let's discuss how I can contribute to your team

experiences.description: Working on decentralized AI mining and ML engineering, deploying and optimizing LLM models across multiple subnets, implementing distributed training pipelines, and building monitoring and security infrastructure.
achievements: Deployed fine-tuned Llama-3-8B model on Subnet 1 using vLLM inference server on NVIDIA A100, achieving 0.43s latency and ranking top-12% among 342 miners
Implemented gradient synchronization pipeline for distributed training using PyTorch DDP, reducing communication overhead by 31%
Built automated subnet registration system reducing registration expenses by 67% across 6 subnet deployments
Engineered LoRA fine-tuning pipeline with Hugging Face PEFT achieving 91.3% task accuracy improvement
Designed real-time monitoring dashboard using Prometheus, Grafana, and FastAPI with 99.4% uptime

experiences.description: Architected and led development of full-stack location intelligence platform from scratch, establishing technical direction and leading 2 engineers. Built RAG-powered business intelligence features, geospatial analytics dashboards, AI-powered vector search, and comprehensive MLOps platform with Gen AI capabilities.
achievements: Architected full-stack location intelligence platform with React TypeScript, FastAPI, and PostgreSQL/PostGIS, reducing site selection time by 70%
Led delivery of RAG-powered business intelligence feature using Pinecone, OpenAI GPT-4, and Claude 3, processing 10K+ queries daily with 92% satisfaction
Built geospatial analytics dashboard with Mapbox GL JS and Chart.js, reducing query latency by 60% with Redis caching
Developed AI-powered vector search feature with Pinecone and OpenAI embeddings, enabling semantic search with <100ms response time
Architected zero-downtime deployment infrastructure with GitHub Actions, achieving 99.9% uptime and 75% reduction in deployment time

experiences.description: Architected and developed full-stack authorship determination platform from scratch, building document analysis systems, AI content detection APIs, plagiarism detection engines, and multi-tenant SaaS platform architecture for academic integrity.
achievements: Architected authorship determination platform with React, FastAPI, and AWS SageMaker, processing 500,000+ document analyses daily with 94% accuracy
Developed real-time AI content detection API service with sub-200ms latency, handling 100,000+ detection requests daily
Created plagiarism detection engine with AWS Elasticsearch, detecting 40,000+ instances monthly
Implemented multi-tenant SaaS platform with AWS ECS, ensuring FERPA/GDPR compliance for CollegeBoard implementation
Built document processing pipeline handling 10TB+ of text data monthly with zero-downtime deployments

experiences.description: Refactored and enhanced core accessibility testing engine, developed comprehensive Angular design system library, built automated accessibility testing pipelines, and created multi-tenant accessibility monitoring platform for digital accessibility compliance.
achievements: Refactored accessibility testing engine using Python, Flask, and SQLAlchemy, improving scan accuracy by 40% and reducing false positives by 35%
Developed comprehensive Angular design system library with full WCAG 2.1/2.2 compliance, improving accessibility score from 80% to 95%
Built automated accessibility testing pipeline integrating with CI/CD, reducing remediation costs by 50% for clients
Created accessibility testing API with Python, FastAPI, and AWS Lambda, expanding platform reach to 200+ partner organizations
Built multi-tenant monitoring platform processing 10,000+ scans daily with 99.9% uptime
